content.rendered:
Cleanliness is next to godliness

A poster campaign for Suchitwa Mission

For many, the cleanliness of their surroundings is not a priority. Suchitwa Mission wanted to drive home the fact that if we don’t keep our homes and our surroundings clean, we can fall ill. As a first step, they wanted people to dispose of their garbage properly.
